name: Timoteo's Hourglass
description:
Timoteo's Hourglass is a puzzle game where you have to pick all the hourglasses in the level and the go to the exit door. Picking hourglasses allow you to shift time back and forward. You'll have to take advantage of time travel. For example: create a hole with your shovel, fall through it, then go back in time to remove the hole.

CONTROLS Keyboard

Movement: D-pad

 Shovel: Space key

Pause menu: ESC

Shift time to the future: Right control

Shift time to the past: Left control

You can restart the current level in the pause menu or by pressing F1.

Gamepad

Movement: D-pad

 Shovel: Button A

Shift time to the future: Button R

Shift time to the past: Button L

Pause menu: Button Start

You can restart the current level in the pause menu.

Mouse

Mouse can only be used in the menus

Features
  • 10 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Full English, Spanish and Russian translations
  • Respecting Game Boy limitations
  • Gameplay reminiscent of the classic Lode Runner
